key.name: disable-command-line
key.description: Prevent the user from accessing the terminal or specifying a command line to be executed. For example, this would disable access to the panel's "Run Application" dialog.

key.name: disable-save-to-disk
key.description: Prevent the user from saving files to disk. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Save as" dialogs.

key.name: disable-printing
key.description: Prevent the user from printing. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Print" dialogs.

key.name: disable-print-setup
key.description: Prevent the user from modifying print settings. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Print Setup" dialogs.

key.name: disable-user-switching
key.description: Prevent the user from switching to another account while his session is active.

key.name: disable-lock-screen
key.description: Prevent the user to lock his screen.

key.name: disable-application-handlers
key.summary: Disable URL and MIME type handlers
key.description: Prevent running any URL or MIME type handler applications.

key.name: disable-log-out
key.description: Prevent the user from logging out.
